column4: how to i see the workgroup witch i create from samba server configuration gui
it should be in /etc/samba/smb.conf  or try the smbtree or findsmb command.
MSHOME section what refers to
thats your workgroup i think
sorry for question but how can i access shares on my workgroup of ubuntu machine from windows xp machine ?
you should be able to browse to the machine, same as you would any other share on the network. You prob. should make the 'workgroup' the same
thanks your second suggestion directly with ip of the host work for me
you mean you turned on 'compiz' ? via 'compiz --replace' ?
just start it from shell ccsm and try the effects
doesn`t work
you ran 'compiz --replace' ? yes/no?
i run this now i don`t see the top button on windows like remove and minimize
and i cant move the windows
compiz handles the 'special effects' If it carshes or cant run due to drivers/hardware - you lose the titlebar/contorlss on the top of the window.
thts why ccsm was doing nothing.. compiz was not running.
so compiz is not compatible with my machine?
Youhave not stated what your hardware is... so we dont know.
i hope this can help to tell me 00:00.0 Host bridge: Intel Corporation Mobile PM965/GM965/GL960 Memory Controller Hub (rev 03)
so you have a Intem GM965 like it says.
is this compatible with compiz?
should be if the drivers support 3d.
i belive not all wirless cards in linux can do ad-hoc - ive never had it working the few times ive tried.
